# HelloGo

# Set up a workspace
Before you start creating or importing your GoLand project, make sure you have done the following:
Created a workspace where you keep projects.
Use the following layout:
- work
  - bin
  - pkg
  - src
     - github.com
        - user_name
           - project1
           - project2
           
# Tutorial
https://tour.go-zh.org/welcome/1
